awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with problems in noncommutative                  ring theory, category theory and other areas of algebra. The                    principal investigator will work on representable functors from                 varieties of associative rings to varieties of other algebraic                  objects. In addition, he will study the Gel'fand-Kirillov                       dimension of factor rings and lattices realizable as lattices of                all two-sided ideals of von Neumann regular rings.                                   The research supported concerns a wide spectum of problems                 in ring theory. It has the potential of impacting many areas of                 mathematics including ring theory, algebraic number theory,                     finite group theory and universal algebra, as well as, computer                 science.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
